Package Classes

Class QRcodeManager

java.lang.Object
Classes.QRcodeManager
public class QRcodeManager extends Object
QRcodeManager The QRcodeManager class manages QR code operations within Firebase Firestore, including adding, retrieving, and searching for QR codes by event ID.
See Also:
  • QRcode

    Interface for handling QR code fetch results.

    Interface for handling QR code search results.

  • Method Details

    • createQRcodeFromDocument

      public QRcode createQRcodeFromDocument(com.google.firebase.firestore.DocumentSnapshot document)
      Creates a QRcode object from a Firestore document snapshot.
      Parameters:
      document - Firestore document snapshot containing QR code data.
      Returns:
      a new QRcode object with data from the document.

    • addQRcode

      public String addQRcode(QRcode qrcode)
      Adds a new QR code to the Firestore collection.
      Parameters:
      qrcode - the QRcode object to add.
      Returns:
      the generated unique ID for the added QR code.

    • getQRcode

      public void getQRcode(String qrcodeID, QRcodeManager.onQRcodeFetchListener callback)
      Fetches a QR code by its ID and executes a callback upon completion.
      Parameters:
      qrcodeID - the unique ID of the QR code to fetch.
      callback - the callback listener for handling the result.

    • searchQRcode

      public void searchQRcode(String value, QRcodeManager.OnQRcodeSearchListener listener)
      retrieves the String QRcode given the eventID of the specific event
      Parameters:
      value - String
      listener - OnQRcodeSearchListener
